Reviews.Content: stayed family weekend awsome stay neat suite clean looks service excellent checked midnight world channels country enjoyed party music didnt disturb enjoyed free gifts front desk guy overall nice excellent stay

Reviews.Title: “No hot water and no toilet paper.”

Reviews.Content: call front desk everytime shower hot water ran toilet paper sp told front desk pick ourselves clean towels thursday thru monday service monday wednesday friday check thursday scheduled friday clean sheets toilet paper hot water clean towels soap breakfast consisted coffee orange juice apple juice bread toast bagels pastry kinds cold cereal hot fruit eggs yogurt microwave refrig freezer reception indian tv channels phones following internet day told 3am

Reviews.Title: “decent size room, but the bathroom was gross!!”
Reviews.Author: sarajorn
Reviews.Content: basically chose motel cheap sleep pleasant surprise bigger anticipated price bathroom clean beds fairly comfortable pretty quiet overall mini fridge temperature control control knob broken biggest issue cleanliness bathroom wasnt awful hairs sink didnt feeling sanitized breakfast decent hurry grabbed checkin painfully slow staff friendly overall guess pay
